title: Airbnb bookings hit record high as travel recovers
description: Rising prices did not deter travellers, the lodging website said.

title: Uber attracts record number of drivers as cost of living bites
description: The ride-hailing app had been facing a driver shortage, leading to long waiting times for customers.

title: Cristiano Ronaldo & Harry Maguire most abused players on Twitter - report
description: Manchester United's Cristiano Ronaldo and Harry Maguire receive the most Twitter abuse of any Premier League players, a report finds.

title: Ambani and Adani: Asia's richest men battle to dominate 5G in India
description: Mukesh Ambani and Gautam Adani are set to compete in the world's second-largest internet market.
